templates.description:
An example CakePHP application with a MySQL database. For more information about using this template, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/openshift/cakephp-ex/blob/master/README.md.

WARNING: Any data stored will be lost upon pod destruction. Only use this template for testing.

templates.description: Memcached service. It uses memcached image from official repository at docker hub. https://hub.docker.com/r/library/memcached/
templates.name: memcached

templates.description:
MailCatcher ( https://mailcatcher.me ) runs a super simple SMTP server which catches any message sent to it to display in a web interface.
It uses mailcatcher image from unofficial repository at docker hub. https://hub.docker.com/r/schickling/mailcatcher/
templates.name: mailcatcher

templates.description:
MariaDB database service, without persistent storage. For more information about using this template, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/mariadb-container/blob/master/10.1/README.md.

WARNING: Any data stored will be lost upon pod destruction. Only use this template for testing
templates.name: mariadb-ephemeral

templates.description:
MariaDB database service, with persistent storage. For more information about using this template, including OpenShift considerations, see https://github.com/sclorg/mariadb-container/blob/master/10.1/README.md.

NOTE: Scaling to more than one replica is not supported. You must have persistent volumes available in your cluster to use this template.
templates.name: mariadb-persistent
